api-reference.title: API Reference
api-reference.description: Complete API reference for integrating PrecogX security monitoring into your custom AI applications and workflows.

architecture.title: Layered Security Architecture
architecture.description: PrecogX's Layered Security Architecture provides enterprise-grade AI security through a sophisticated multi-layer detection and prevention system. This architecture combines automated threat detection with human-in-the-loop validation, ensuring maximum security while maintaining operational efficiency.

customer-value.title: Customer Value Delivery
customer-value.description: This document outlines how PrecogX's "Agent-as-Impact™" model delivers measurable value to customers through each stage of their journey, from initial onboarding to ongoing protection and analytics. We use a real estate AI agent as our primary example to demonstrate concrete value delivery.

frameworks.title: Framework Integration
frameworks.description: PrecogX provides seamless integration with all major AI frameworks. Choose your framework below to get started with comprehensive AI agent security monitoring.

getting-started/first-agent.title: Creating Your First Agent
getting-started/first-agent.description: Learn how to create and protect your first AI agent with PrecogX.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation Guide
getting-started/installation.description: Detailed installation instructions for PrecogX SDK and integrations.

getting-started/quickstart.title: Quickstart Guide
getting-started/quickstart.description: Get up and running with PrecogX in 5 minutes.

integrations/dify.title: Dify Integration Guide
integrations/dify.description: Connect your Dify AI applications to PrecogX for comprehensive security monitoring and threat detection.

integrations/flowise.title: Flowise Integration Guide
integrations/flowise.description: Connect your Flowise AI workflows to PrecogX for comprehensive security monitoring and threat detection.

integrations/n8n.title: n8n Integration Guide
integrations/n8n.description: Connect your n8n workflows to PrecogX for comprehensive AI security monitoring and threat detection.

intro.title: Welcome to PrecogX
intro.description: AI-native cybersecurity for the modern world

no-code-integration.title: No-Code Platform Integration
no-code-integration.description: Connect your favorite no-code AI platforms and workflow automation tools to PrecogX for comprehensive security monitoring. No coding required - just configure webhooks and start protecting your AI agents!

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: PrecogX offers flexible pricing plans designed to scale with your AI security needs. Our "Agent-as-Impact™" model ensures you only pay for meaningful security events, not API calls or storage.

security.title: Security & Encryption
security.description: PrecogX implements enterprise-grade security measures to protect your sensitive AI agent data and telemetry information. This document outlines our comprehensive security architecture and encryption practices.

slack-integration.title: Slack Integration Guide
slack-integration.description: Connect PrecogX to your Slack workspace to receive real-time security alerts and manage detections directly from Slack.
